detectors.description: Lottery.findAndPayTheWinner() () uses a weak PRNG: "winnerIndex = uint256(block.blockhash(block.number - 1)) % participants.length ()"
detectors.markdown: [Lottery.findAndPayTheWinner()]() uses a weak PRNG: "[winnerIndex = uint256(block.blockhash(block.number - 1)) % participants.length]()"

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lottery.conclude() ():
	External calls:
	- ! findAndPayTheWinner() ()
		- success = winner.send(prize) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- delete participants ()
	- i < m ()
	- participants.push(pendingParticipants[i]) ()
	- delete pendingParticipants ()
	- delete pendingParticipants[i] ()
	- pendingParticipants.length -= m ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Lottery.conclude()]():
	External calls:
	- [! findAndPayTheWinner()]()
		- [success = winner.send(prize)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [delete participants]()
	- [i < m]()
	- [participants.push(pendingParticipants[i])]()
	- [delete pendingParticipants]()
	- [delete pendingParticipants[i]]()
	- [pendingParticipants.length -= m]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lottery.findAndPayTheWinner() ():
	External calls:
	- success = winner.send(prize) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RoundEnded(winner,prize) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Lottery.findAndPayTheWinner()]():
	External calls:
	- [success = winner.send(prize)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [RoundEnded(winner,prize)]()

detectors.markdown: Loop condition [i < pendingParticipants.length]() should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
